query:
SELECT
            message_id,
            bit_count( (phash # $1)::bit(64) ) as distance
        FROM images
        WHERE chat_id = $2
            AND bit_count( (phash # $1)::bit(64) ) <= $3
            AND ($4::INT IS NULL OR message_id != $4)
        ORDER BY distance ASC, message_id ASC
        LIMIT 1
